articles.title: Trump’s campaign against ‘left-wing’ media finds a new target: Apple News - The Washington Post
articles.description: Federal Trade Commission Chairman Andrew Ferguson wrote a letter to Apple that warned the company its choice of articles in Apple News could violate the law.

articles.title: Amazon no longer working with controversial police tech company after backlash over Ring doorbell Super Bowl ad - NBC News
articles.description: Amazon has dropped plans to partner its Ring doorbell cameras with the police surveillance tech company Flock Safety, the companies said Thursday, days after Amazon aired a controversial ad for Ring that some viewed as depicting the technology as a threat to …

articles.title: Gold Steadies After Sharp Drop Sparked by Wider Market Jitters - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Gold clawed back some losses after a sudden selloff in the previous session, with dip-buyers snapping up the metal ahead of key US inflation data.

articles.title: Asian Stocks to Drop as AI Jitters Hit Wall Street: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Asian equities retreated from a record after concerns over the impact of artificial intelligence on some companies spurred a selloff in US technology stocks. Gold and silver recouped some of their losses from the prior session.

articles.title: Amid disappointing earnings, Pinterest claims it sees more searches than ChatGPT - TechCrunch
articles.description: Pinterest's stock tumbles after an earnings miss, with higher-than-expected usage its only bright spot.

articles.title: Moderna’s president weighs in on FDA’s decision not to review its flu vaccine - statnews.com
articles.description: In an interview, Moderna President Stephen Hoge took questions on an FDA decision on the biotech's mRNA flu vaccine, as well as the impact on the company and others in the industry.

articles.title: Stock futures are little changed as traders await big consumer inflation report: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Major U.S. averages dropped on Thursday as fears around artificial intelligence disruption spread across the market.

articles.description: The company's annual revenue was boosted by its technology joint venture with Volkswagen Group.
